# Task

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.



# Data

pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"])

```julia
function pig_latinify(words::Vector{String})
    results = Vector{String}(undef, length(words))
    threads = Vector{Future}(undef, length(words))

    for (i, word) in enumerate(words)
        thr = @async begin
            result = pig_latinify_word(word)
            results[i] = result
        end
        threads[i] = thr
    end

    wait.(threads)
    return results
end

function pig_latinify_word(word::String)
    vowels = "aeiou"
    if word[1] âˆˆ vowels
        return word * "way"
    else
        return substring(word, 2:end) * word[1] * "ay"
    end
end

# Example usage
pig_latinify(["hello", "apple", "strong", "world"]) # => ["hloway", "ppleway", "trongway", "orldway"]
```
